title: Start of SEC Media Days
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, Jordan Rodgers, Takeo Spikes, and Pete Thamel break down Day 1 of SEC Media Days. LSU HC Brian Kelly talks his move to the SEC and conference realignment, Lane Kiffin takes the podium, and McElroy & Rodgers give their early Heisman favorites.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down the 1st day of SEC Media Days.
